20-034EC.summary: Recommendation to conduct a study session to interview and evaluate applicants from Council Districts 5 and 6 for the Independent Redistricting Commission, with final recommendations to be presented at the October 14, 2020 meeting of the Ethics Commission.Page 1 of 2TELECONFERENCE, 3:00 PMTHURSDAY, OCTOBER 8, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESChair Wise spoke.Stafford Cox spoke.Sharon Diggs-Jackson spoke.Susana Flores spoke.Feliza Ortiz Licon spoke.David Salazar spoke.Chair Wise declared a recess at 3:35 p.m.Chair Wise called the meeting back to order at 3:45 p.m.Chair Wise spoke.Alejandra Gutierrez spoke.Kelly Nhim spoke.This EC-Agenda Item was received and filed.2.
